privacyText1: A shafin Sir Jimmy, muna daraja sirrin ku. Wannan gidan yanar gizo baya tattara bayanan sirri fiye da abin da kuka bayar (misali, lokacin da kuka tuntuɓe mu ta imel ko WhatsApp).
privacyText2: Zai yiwu mu yi amfani da kukis da fasahohi makamancin haka don inganta amfani (kamar adana saitunan yanayin duhu ko tunawa da abubuwan da kuka fi so). Ba a sayar ko raba bayanan ku da wani ɓangare na uku.
privacyText3: Hanyoyin waje (misali WhatsApp, imel, GitHub) na iya kai ku zuwa wasu shafuka da ba mu da iko da su. Muna ƙarfafa ku duba manufofinsu daban.
privacyText4: Ta amfani da wannan shafin, kun yarda da amfani da kukis da sarrafa bayanan da ba na sirri ba don ƙara inganta kwarewar ku.
termsText1: Barka da zuwa shafin Sir Jimmy. Ta amfani da wannan gidan yanar gizo, kun yarda da waɗannan sharuɗɗan:
termsList1: Abubuwan da aka bayar suna don bayani da nuni kawai.
termsList2: Fasali kamar yanayin duhu, kunna kiɗa, da widget suna zuwa kamar yadda suke ba tare da garanti ba.
termsList3: Ba mu da alhakin matsalolin da suka taso daga hanyoyin waje (misali WhatsApp, imel, GitHub).
termsList4: Kun yarda da kada ku yi amfani da wannan shafin ta hanyar da bata dace ba ko kawo cikas ga aiki.
termsText2: Muna da ikon sabunta waɗannan sharuɗɗa a kowane lokaci. Ci gaba da amfani da shafin bayan canje-canje na nufin kun amince.
